cab.content: ^ BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 8th NOVEMBER, 1918.WESTERN FRONT, British FrontoThe Fifth Army ha3 crossed the SCHELDT in the neigh-bourhood of HCLLAIN without much opposition, and has occupies the villages of IAPLAIGNE and BELIjGY. It also iplde the T/estern half of TOURNAI.East of the FORET DE MORMAL further progress has been made and the villages of ST. REMI-MAL-BATI and FONTAINE have*been taken.It is also reported that HAUTMONT is clear of the enemy* *North of HENSIES the First Army lias established a bridge-head on the CCNDE - .M0NS CANAL. French FrontaThe advance between HIRSON and the ME USE continues 9 bub no details have yet been received as to progress made.There is nothing to report from any other frontsGeneral Staff,War Office, S.W.I. 8th November, 1918. Issued at 18.30
